abdwr3edata 0.0.3
  • Reference

Retrosheet events data for 2016

Source: R/data.R
retro2016.Rd

Retrosheet play-by-play data for complete 2016 season

Usage

retro2016

Format

GAME_ID

game id

AWAY_TEAM_ID

visiting team

INN_CT

inning

BAT_HOME_ID

batting team

OUTS_CT

outs

BALLS_CT

balls

STRIKES_CT

strikes

PITCH_SEQ_TX

pitch sequence

AWAY_SCORE_CT

vis score

HOME_SCORE_CT

home score

BAT_ID

batter

BAT_HAND_CD

batter hand

RESP_BAT_ID

res batter

RESP_BAT_HAND_CD

res batter hand

PIT_ID

pitcher

PIT_HAND_CD

pitcher hand

RESP_PIT_ID

res pitcher

RESP_PIT_HAND_CD

res pitcher hand

POS2_FLD_ID

catcher

POS3_FLD_ID

first base

POS4_FLD_ID

second base

POS5_FLD_ID

third base

POS6_FLD_ID

shortstop

POS7_FLD_ID

left field

POS8_FLD_ID

center field

POS9_FLD_ID

right field

BASE1_RUN_ID

first runner

BASE2_RUN_ID

second runner

BASE3_RUN_ID

third runner

EVENT_TX

event text

LEADOFF_FL

leadoff flag

PH_FL

pinchhit flag

BAT_FLD_CD

defensive position

BAT_LINEUP_ID

lineup position

EVENT_CD

event type

BAT_EVENT_FL

batter event flag

AB_FL

ab flag

H_FL

hit value

SH_FL

SH flag

SF_FL

SF flag

EVENT_OUTS_CT

outs on play

DP_FL

double play flag

TP_FL

triple play flag

RBI_CT

RBI on play

WP_FL

wild pitch flag

PB_FL

passed ball flag

FLD_CD

fielded by

BATTEDBALL_CD

batted ball type

BUNT_FL

bunt flag

FOUL_FL

foul flag

BATTEDBALL_LOC_TX

hit location

ERR_CT

num errors

ERR1_FLD_CD

1st error player

ERR1_CD

1st error type

ERR2_FLD_CD

2nd error player

ERR2_CD

2nd error type

ERR3_FLD_CD

3rd error player

ERR3_CD

3rd error type

BAT_DEST_ID

batter dest

RUN1_DEST_ID

runner on 1st dest

RUN2_DEST_ID

runner on 2nd dest

RUN3_DEST_ID

runner on 3rd dest

BAT_PLAY_TX

play on batter

RUN1_PLAY_TX

play on runner on 1st

RUN2_PLAY_TX

play on runner on 2nd

RUN3_PLAY_TX

play on runner on 3rd

RUN1_SB_FL

SB for runner on 1st flag

RUN2_SB_FL

SB for runner on 2nd flag

RUN3_SB_FL

SB for runner on 3rd flag

RUN1_CS_FL

CS for runner on 1st flag

RUN2_CS_FL

CS for runner on 2nd flag

RUN3_CS_FL

CS for runner on 3rd flag

RUN1_PK_FL

PO for runner on 1st flag

RUN2_PK_FL

PO for runner on 2nd flag

RUN3_PK_FL

PO for runner on 3rd flag

RUN1_RESP_PIT_ID

responsible pitcher for runner on 1st

RUN2_RESP_PIT_ID

responsible pitcher for runner on 2nd

RUN3_RESP_PIT_ID

responsible pitcher for runner on 3rd

GAME_NEW_FL

new game flag

GAME_END_FL

end game flag

PR_RUN1_FL

pinch-runner on 1st

PR_RUN2_FL

pinch-runner on 2nd

PR_RUN3_FL

pinch-runner on 3rd

REMOVED_FOR_PR_RUN1_ID

runner removed for pinch-runner on 1st

REMOVED_FOR_PR_RUN2_ID

runner removed for pinch-runner on 2nd

REMOVED_FOR_PR_RUN3_ID

runner removed for pinch-runner on 3rd

REMOVED_FOR_PH_BAT_ID

batter removed for pinch-hitter

REMOVED_FOR_PH_BAT_FLD_CD

position of batter removed for pinch-hitter

PO1_FLD_CD

fielder with first putout

PO2_FLD_CD

fielder with second putout

PO3_FLD_CD

fielder with third putout

ASS1_FLD_CD

fielder with first assist

ASS2_FLD_CD

fielder with second assist

ASS3_FLD_CD

fielder with third assist

ASS4_FLD_CD

fielder with fourth assist

ASS5_FLD_CD

fielder with fifth assist

EVENT_ID

event num

Source

Retrosheet Event files

See also

baseballr::retrosheet_data()
